abstract: The Altria Group will combine Copenhagen and Skoal snuff with its Marlboro cigarettes and vault ahead of Reynolds American as the biggest seller of smokeless tobacco.
snippet: The Altria Group will combine Copenhagen and Skoal snuff with its Marlboro cigarettes and vault ahead of Reynolds American as the biggest seller of smokeless tobacco.
lead_paragraph: The Altria Group agreed to buy UST for $10.3 billion to combine Copenhagen and Skoal snuff with its Marlboro cigarettes and vault ahead of Reynolds American as the biggest seller of smokeless tobacco.

headline.main: Altria to Buy UST, a Snuff Maker, for $10.3 Billion
headline.print_headline: Altria Agrees to Buy UST for $10.3 Billion

abstract: Left mostly vacant in a corporate restructuring, the Altria Group’s lavish but quirky Midtown skyscraper is looking for new tenants.
snippet: Left mostly vacant in a corporate restructuring, the Altria Group’s lavish but quirky Midtown skyscraper is looking for new tenants.
lead_paragraph: When the Altria Group moved its headquarters from New York earlier this year, it left behind a distinctive piece of real estate.

headline.main: It’s Open House at Last at Altria’s Midtown Home
headline.print_headline: It’s Open House at Last At Altria’s Midtown Home
